it.apice.sapere.api.lsas.values
Interface PropertyValue<Type extends Comparable<Type>,CompType>

Type Parameters:
Type - Inner type stored inside the Property Value
CompType - Type for comparison (the final interface name)
All Superinterfaces:
Comparable<CompType>
All Known Subinterfaces:
BooleanValue, DateTimeValue, DoubleValue, FloatValue, IntegerValue, LiteralValue, LongValue, LSAidValue, SDescValue, URIValue
All Known Implementing Classes:
BooleanValueImpl, DateTimeValueImpl, DoubleValueImpl, FloatValueImpl, IntegerValueImpl, LiteralValueImpl, LongValueImpl, LSAidValueImpl, PropertyValueImpl, SDescValueImpl, URIValueImpl
public interface PropertyValue<Type extends Comparable<Type>,CompType>
extends Comparable<CompType>

A Property Value is a generic value (URI or Literal) that can be associated to a Property.

This entity is intended to be:

  • Atomic
  • Passive
  • Functional (not-mutable state)

Author:
Paolo Contessi
